Package auctions

Class AuctionHouse

java.lang.Object
auctions.AuctionHouse
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class AuctionHouse
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Represents an auction house. Runnable singleton class.

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct​(Product newProduct) throws DuplicateProductException
      Adds a new product to the products list.
      Parameters:
      newProduct - The new product to be added.
      Throws:
      DuplicateProductException - When the product already exists.

      Parameters:

    • addClient

      public void addClient​(Client newClient) throws DuplicateClientException
      Adds a new client to the clients list.
      Parameters:
      newClient - The new client to be added.
      Throws:
      DuplicateClientException - When the client already exists in the list.

    • logClients

      public void logClients​(java.lang.String filename)
      Reads and adds clients from an input file to the clients list.
      Parameters:
      filename - The input filename.

    • processClientRequest

      public void processClientRequest​(int clientID, int productID, int maxBid) throws ClientNotFountException, ProductNotFoundException, AuctionAlreadyActiveException
      Updates a pending auction or creates a new one with a new client.
      Parameters:
      clientID - The client id.
      productID - The product id.
      maxBid - The maximum bid of the client.
      Throws:
      ClientNotFountException - When the client does not exist in the list.
      ProductNotFoundException - When the product does not exist in the list.
      AuctionAlreadyActiveException - When the auction for that specific product is already active.

    • showBrokerEarnings

      public void showBrokerEarnings()
      Shows all broker earnings.

    • showSoldProducts

      public void showSoldProducts()
      Shows all sold products information.

    • showProducts

      public void showProducts()
      Shows all available products information.

    • showClients

      public void showClients()
      Shows all logged on client information.

    • checkClientRequest

      private Client checkClientRequest​(int clientID, int productID) throws ClientNotFountException, ProductNotFoundException, AuctionAlreadyActiveException
      Checks if a client request to join an auction for a specific product is valid.
      Parameters:
      clientID - The client id.
      productID - The product id.
      Returns:
      The client that requested to join the auction, if the request is valid, and NULL otherwise
      Throws:
      ClientNotFountException - When the client is not logged on.
      ProductNotFoundException - When the product does not exist.
      AuctionAlreadyActiveException - When the auction is already active.

    • updatePendingAuction

      private void updatePendingAuction​(Client client, Auction auction, int maxBid)
      Updates a pending auction with a new client.
      Parameters:
      client - The client to be added to the auction.
      auction - The auction to be updated.
      maxBid - The maximum bid of the client to be added.

    • startAuction

      private void startAuction​(Auction auction)
      Starts a pending auction.
      Parameters:
      auction - The pending auction to be started.

    • createAuction

      private void createAuction​(Client client, int productID, int maxBid)
      Creates a new auction and adds it to the pending list.
      Parameters:
      client - The first client of the auction.
      productID - The product id for the auction.
      maxBid - The maximum bid of the first client.

    • assignBroker

      private void assignBroker​(Client client, Auction auction)
      Assigns a broker to a client in an auction.
      Parameters:
      client - The client.
      auction - The broker.

    • getMaxBid

      private Pair<Client,​java.lang.Double> getMaxBid​(java.util.ArrayList<Pair<Client,​java.lang.Double>> bidsList, int step)
      Gets the maximum bid (and its respective client) from a list of bids.
      Parameters:
      bidsList - The list of bids.
      step - The current step of the auction that the bids were made for.
      Returns:
      A pair representing the maximum bid and its respective client.

    • finaliseAuction

      private void finaliseAuction​(Client possibleWinner, double maxBid)
      Ends an active auction.
      Parameters:
      possibleWinner - The client who bid the most.
      maxBid - The maximum bid for that auction.

    • sellProduct

      private void sellProduct​(Client winner, Product prod, double bid)
      Sells a product.
      Parameters:
      winner - The client that bought the product over an auction.
      prod - The product to be sold.
      bid - The bid for which the product was sold.

    • payBrokers

      private void payBrokers​(Auction auction)
      Pays the brokers their commission.
      Parameters:
      auction - The auction for which the brokers are getting paid.

    • run

      public void run()
      run method override from the Runnable interface. Runs an auction.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
